googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Russell Hammontree
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I posted a request for a local plumber for an RV Leak . Most residential businesses shy away from this because of the aggregation and difference between RV and residential .
5 minutes after my post I got a call from Evans Plumbing . I was told that they could help me out “ sometime “ after lunch
I realized that they were busy and already doing other scheduled projects . I was told they would be able to help me sometime after lunch . Well . Got a call at 5:30 pm  , Nick , with Evans Plumbing is at my driveway gate .  ?  What , ??  I used to own my own construction business , by 5:30pm I wanted to be at home with my family ( and beer ) .
He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !
He took care of the problem and did an excellent job !!
I highly recommend EVANS PLUMBING !!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 8850 Broadus Loop Rd, Eight Mile, AL 36613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amanda Dunn
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Absolutely the worst service I've ever had in my life. For about a month and a half I couldn't use my washer or dishwasher because it would cause the toilet to overflow and back up into my tub. My toilet also didn't work half of the time without backing up nasty dirty water into my tub when flushing. I couldn't take a shower without it not draining and being full to where I'd have to use a bucket to go and dump all the excess water. They came out four times with excuse after excuse on why they'd have to come back. Every single time there was a different reason for it. Told me I'd need to have a new sewer line ran to bypass the issue. And then even once that was deemed to be the solution they couldn't seem to be bothered to come out within a reasonable time as they had an excuse for it.  and said they had to wait on Mawws to locate the line. Only to come out one final time to "try one more thing" so I go to meet them there and what really pisses me off is they were there for maybe 15 minutes didnt seem to try much of nothing and then had I not heard them leaving, they wouldn't have said anything to me on the issue. Tech already drove off so I caught the helpers who could only seem to not know what to say other than suddenly the boss "should be able to come out Monday and use his camera to locate it." Overall no communication whatsoever from them. And the real kicker, ended up getting someone else after that because of piss poor service and guess what! The other company came out, found what they couldn't, got my line cleared out and unclogged. They solved the issue in about 6 hours. In ONE day what Evans couldn't in a month and a half. I hate writing bad reviews but I feel this just was wrong.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.address: 8850 Broadus Loop Rd, Eight Mile, AL 36613, United States
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kyle Neighbors
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We had a leak, and we needed them right away. I called, and they came in 15 minutes. They were knowledgeable, courteous, and pleasant. The job was done quickly and correctly. They cleaned up and left it better than when they got here. I’d use them again.

Just a total mess have a different company out here, Just beware...

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc., based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: The business is licensed to operate in Alabama, though specific license details are not provided in the sources. It is advised to contact the business or check the state's licensing database for the most current information[1].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: The business is located at 8850 Broadus Loop Rd, Eight Mile, AL 36613. The service areas are not explicitly stated, but it is implied to serve the surrounding regions of Eight Mile, AL[1][5].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The business operates from Monday to Friday, 7:30 AM to 5:00 PM. It is closed on Sundays and Saturdays. Payment methods are not specified, but it is common for such services to accept various payment options including major credit cards[1].
- **Years in Operation**: The exact years in operation are not provided in the sources.

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc. offers services in plumbing, septic systems, and drain cleaning[1].
- **Service Areas Covered**: While the specific service areas are not detailed, it is based in Eight Mile, AL, and likely serves the nearby areas.
- **Emergency Service Availability**: There is no explicit mention of emergency service availability, but it is common for plumbing services to offer some form of emergency or after-hours service.
- **Prices or Rates**: No specific prices or rates are listed in the sources provided[1].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: The business has a rating of 3.8 out of 5 stars based on 35 reviews. Reviews indicate satisfaction with the quality, value, professionalism, responsiveness, and punctuality of the service. For example, the reviews highlight positive experiences with the business's reliability and professionalism[1].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: There is no information provided about the BBB rating or status in the sources.
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Customers often praise the business for its quality service, professionalism, and responsiveness.
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews.

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**: The owner or management details are not specified in the sources provided.
- **Staff Qualifications**: There is no information available on the staff qualifications or professional certifications.
- **Professional Certifications**: No specific certifications are mentioned, but it is implied that the business operates with licensed contractors given the nature of the services provided[1].

This information is specific to Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc., located at 8850 Broadus Loop Rd, Eight Mile, AL 36613.
aboutUs: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc. is a trusted local plumbing company serving the Eight Mile, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in comprehensive plumbing solutions, septic system maintenance, and drain cleaning services. With a deep commitment to excellence, we leverage our expertise to deliver top-notch results tailored to your specific needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Reliable and efficient plumbing solutions from a team of local experts.
sellingPoints: Prompt response times and punctual service, ensuring your plumbing issues are addressed swiftly.
Highly trained technicians equipped with the latest tools and techniques to tackle even the most complex plumbing challenges.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, so you know exactly what to expect before we begin any work.
